text: == Classification == {| align=center style="font-size: 90%; border- collapse:collapse" border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=2 |- align=center bgcolor=#98A1B2 !width=40| !width=220|Season ranking 1962 !width=55|Pt !width=40|G !width=40|W !width=40|L !width=40|PF !width=40|PA |- align=center style="background:#DDEEFF" | 1. ||style="text-align:left;"| Olimpija ||32||18||16||2||1730||1284 |- align=center | 2. ||style="text-align:left;"| OKK Beograd ||30||18||15||3||1682||1285 |- align=center | 3. ||style="text- align:left;"| Zadar ||28||18||14||4||1548||1310 |- align=center | 4. ||style="text-align:left;"| Lokomotiva ||22||18||11||7||1604||1457 |- align=center | 5. ||style="text-align:left;"| Radnički Belgrade ||20||18||10||8||1463||1305 |- align=center | 6. ||style="text-align:left;"| Partizan ||18||18||9||9||1565||1449 |- align=center | 7. ||style="text- align:left;"| Željezničar Karlovac ||14||18||7||11||1323||1376 |- align=center | 8. ||style="text-align:left;"| Crvena Zvezda ||10||18||5||13||1399||1452 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 9. ||style="text-align:left;"| Željezničar Sarajevo ||4||18||2||16||1187||1504 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 10. ||style="text-align:left;"| Mladost ||2||18||1||17||749||1828 |} The winning roster of Olimpija: * Ivo Daneu * Igor Jelnikar * Matija Dermastija * Emil Logar * Marjan Kandus * Karel Kapelj * Bogdan Müller * Miha Lokar * Marko Vrhovec * Peter Samaluk * Tomo Vavpetič * Borut Bassin * Ivan Potočnik Coach: Boris Kristančič ==Scoring leaders== # Radivoj Korać (OKK Beograd) – ___ points (__ ppg) # ??? # ??? == Qualification in 1962-63 season European competitions == FIBA European Champions Cup * Olimpija (Champions) ==References== Category:Yugoslav First Basketball League seasons
title: 1962 Yugoslav First Basketball League
